resources.string: Unlink this contact into multiple contacts?
Would you like to save the changes you already made and unlink this contact into multiple contacts?
Would you like to save the changes you already made and link with the contact selected?
Choose the contact you want to link with %s:
Contacts from your read-only accounts cannot be deleted, but they can be hidden.
The contact to be deleted has details from multiple accounts. Details from read-only accounts will be hidden, not deleted.
You need at least two contacts selected to perform a link.
Contacts from your read-only accounts cannot be deleted, but they can be hidden.
The contacts to be deleted have details from multiple accounts. Details from read-only accounts will be hidden, not deleted.
Deleting this contact will delete details from multiple accounts.
No pictures are available on the tablet.
No pictures are available on the phone.
To create groups you need an account.
To add some, edit the group.
No app was found to handle this action.
Click to return to previous screen
No app was found to handle this action.
Link the current contact with the selected contact?
Switch to editing the selected contact? Information you entered so far will be copied.
Delete the group \"%1$s\"? (Contacts themselves will not be deleted.)
Type contact name before linking with another.
Discard your changes and quit editing?
Keep your contacts safe even if you lose your phone: synchronize with an online service.
Your new contact won\'t be backed up. Add an account that backs up contacts online?
New contacts will be saved to %1$s.
Choose a default account for new contacts:
recent call. %s. %s. %s. click to call back
Hangouts works better when you enter the person\'s Hangouts identifier into the email field or phone field.
Currently saving to %s. Double-tap to pick a different account.
These contacts might be the same person. You can link them together as a single contact.
